content: hygge burst pillow pattern x wildflower collection by hue loco yarn *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/wildflowerhyggeburstpillow this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy a colourful seasonal delight this version of my hygge burst pillow is exactly what you should be making this summer hue loco yarn did a fantastic job of encapsulating all the colours or wildflowers in her stunning new collection pattern was made using the wildflower collection mini set-dk weight by hue loco yarn and a 4 5mm size 7 hook pattern includes all colours used and the yarn quantities as well as exact positioning my gift to you is taking the work out of colourwork the final pillow size was 14 x 14 square pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours - yarn recommendations/links - stitch glossary - printable pdf of pillow graph - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the granny square used classic sunburst granny square - video tutorials for the sunburst granny square as well as the continuous join as you go method cjayg - written and video tutorial for pillow cover assembly happy crocheting everyone l m
